drug.name: Pegteograstim
drug.description: Pegteograstim is under investigation in clinical trial NCT02787876 (Pegteograstim in Children With Solid Tumors).

drug-interaction.name: Cyclophosphamide
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of pulmonary toxicity can be increased when Pegteograstim is combined with Cyclophosphamide.

drug-interaction.name: Vindesine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Pegteograstim is combined with Vindesine.

drug-interaction.name: Vinorelbine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Pegteograstim is combined with Vinorelbine.

drug-interaction.name: Vincristine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Pegteograstim is combined with Vincristine.

drug-interaction.name: Vinblastine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Pegteograstim is combined with Vinblastine.

drug-interaction.name: Vintafolide
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Pegteograstim is combined with Vintafolide.

drug-interaction.name: Vinflunine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Pegteograstim is combined with Vinflunine.

drug-interaction.name: Vincamine
drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of peripheral neuropathy can be increased when Pegteograstim is combined with Vincamine.
